creditline: The Ford and Amy Bell Endowment Fund for Decorative Arts
description: textured black glazed stoneware vase with white glaze, impressed plum blossom patterning and white slip inlay; rounded body on vertical foot ring tapering to tiny spout with outward-flaring vertical top element
inscription:
On the box lid: 粉華三島　飾壷　　豊作 artist\'s red seal: 豊
Inside of the box lid: 良三識  red seal:良三    濶識  artist\'s red seal: 濶 (濶 is the second son of 近藤悠三; the younger brother of 近藤豊)
markings: on bottom, impressed: untranslated stamp; on bottom, on sticker: [6714]
medium: Wheel-thrown stoneware with black glaze and white-slip inlay
title: Mishima-style decorative pot with scattered flowers pattern
